data.why:
OSPS is a service port generator and cryptographic communication
    system. OSPS is designed to make it easier for you to implement
    need-to-know security for your server port #'s. OSPS is a simple but
    effective system for making your private services that much harder
    to hack. If your IDS/IPS is working then you should be fairly able
    to detect a port scan looking for open services and you can defend
    against those to a degree but if you are running your services on
    WKS ports then scanning isn't required nor is any âman in the
    middle attackâ. OSPS is designed to hide the service port #'s from
    those who do not need to know and yet make them available to those
    who do need to know.
